name: Racecar Bed
description:
Dive into your dreams using the power of friendship to destroy horrific nightmares! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Warning ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Leaving or refreshing the WebGL page will erase save data!  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Notice!
The button that links to the Unity Analytics Privacy Policy is not working on the WebGL build. 
Working on getting it fixed.

Controls

- WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

- Space/Enter to  Advance Dialogue/Interact

- Hold P to skip dialog.

- Backspace to Pause  

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


     "Hi! I'm...

     uh... I actually don't know"





   "PFFFF   what?! 

   You forgot your own name? 

   Did that monster hit you on the head or
   something C--"






          Uh SHHH SHHH SHH!! 

          No, don't say it! 

          The player gets to pick it when they start our
          demo.


   Player? 

   Wait... what's a demo?









      For our game of course! 

Are you ready player? 

Join us in our 3rd grade adventures and relive your elementary school days with all the fun stuff you remember like... 

Making new friends! * * Going to school :D * * Fighting Nightmare Creatures o_o * * Doing chores for Mom and Dad * * Facing your deepest, darkest fears D: * By Scoot-o-Speed-Studios (@scoot_o)

Come say hi in our discord! https://discord.gg/v8SGnFWC33
